news.title: Ukraine to receive US air defence systems, says Trump
news.summary: The US president says he will sell weapons to Nato, which would then give them to Ukraine.

news.title: Watch: Russians tell BBC how they think Ukraine war will end
news.summary: Russian victory is a key message at the 'Patriotic Festival' a few miles outside Moscow.

news.title: Rayner in deepening row with Unite union over Birmingham bin strikes
news.summary: Unite announced earlier it had suspended her membership over the long-running dispute in Birmingham.

news.title: Two residents die after car crashes into care home following police chase
news.summary: Two men, aged 21, are arrested on suspicion of manslaughter, police say.

news.title: Gaza's largest functioning hospital facing disaster, medics warn, as Israel widens offensive
news.summary: Nasser hospital in Khan Younis has a critical shortage of fuel and had to stop admitting patients after Israeli tanks advanced nearby on Thursday.

news.title: Man killed outside five-star hotel in London's Knightsbridge named
news.summary: Blue Stevens, 24, died in a stabbing outside a luxury hotel in west London on Wednesday night.

news.title: 'All my savings are going': Pub landlords fear closure as costs rise
news.summary: Publicans have contacted Your Voice, Your BBC News to sound alarm about the future of the industry.

news.title: Former Met Police commissioner Ian Blair dies
news.summary: Lord Ian Blair served as the Metropolitan Police commissioner from 2005 to 2008.

news.title: MP Rupert Lowe cleared by standards watchdog after brief investigation
news.summary: The standards commissioner says he is satisfied the former Reform MP did not break rules on declaring donations.

news.title: Outrage builds over plan to force all Gazans to southern city
news.summary: Critics denounce a plan by Israel's defence minister to relocate all Palestinians in Gaza to a small area in the south.
